about_the_game:
This DLC is the Soundtrack for Skater Cally, Including 42 Tracks. The Songs come in 320Kbps MP3 Files and can be found in the Install Folder.



Tracklist:
1 - Kickflip
2 - Heelflip
3 - Impossible
4 - Shoveit
5 - Varial
6 - 360 Flip
7 - Kickflip to Indy
8 - Hardflip
9 - Manual
10 - Nose Manual
11 - Method
12 - Nosegrab
13 - Tailgrab
14 - Japan Air
15 - Rocket Air
16 - Stalefish
17 - Benihana
18 - Madonna
19 - Frontslide
20 - Backslide
21 - Crooked
22 - 50-50
23 - Smith
24 - 5-0
25 - Feeble
26 - Darkslide
27 - Laserflip
28 - Overcrook
29 - Frontflip
30 - Backside 720
31 - Backflip
32 - Frontside 720
33 - Kickflip McTwist
34 - Triple Kickflip
35 - Hardflip Lateflip
36 - Fingerflip Airwalk
37 - Ollie
38 - Big Air
39 - Do a 900
40 - Transfer
41 - Stair Gap
42 - Fakie

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
